title: jnAnappAl aruLvAi
sahitya:
jnAnappAl aruLvAi shivanE enda nALum inbattil mUzhgit-tiLaittiDavE


anupallavi

  tEnum pAlum amudum tIngani rasamum pOl dhyAnattil unnaik-kUTTum mOna munivar uNNum


caraNam    immai marumaip-payan ellAmum nIyanrE idayattil un anbai eppOdum vaLarkkinrEn
'ammai appA' venrE azhudunnaik-kUviya AluDaip-piLLaikku nI anbuDan pughaTTiya
